original_title: Gulla Ebong Gullar Ghora ( GULLA AND HIS HORSE )
overview: A self-proclaimed director (Sudipto) and his crew chase Gulla (Mehtab) a poor boy trying to understand his life. They want to capture his everyday life with their video camera. Unemployed Gullaâ€™s condition is just like his old broken cycle. Gulla shows the least interest in the filming and the chase goes on.
title: Gulla Ebong Gullar Ghora ( GULLA AND HIS HORSE )
